title-group.article-title: prediction in new Metal Joining Processes

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1960, Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: NEW WELDING processes are dropping costs while providing improvements in weld quality. This paper describes some of the more promising new developments in pressure and fusion welding and brazing. Included in the discussion are ultrasonic, high frequency resistance, foil seam, magnetic force, percussion, friction, and thermopressure welding and diffusion bonding. The description of adhesive bonding includes the development of glass or ceramic materials as structural adhesives.
